main event: An unidentified aerial phenomenon was observed changing colors from red to white to blue and back around 2035 hours in Fort Worth, Texas.
interesting points: The phenomenon moved west and disappeared shortly before midnight., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The object was concluded to be astronomical and identified as Jupiter., A T-33 jet was dispatched to investigate an object detected by radar over Dallas., The pilot described the object as round, white, and moving at an estimated speed of 500 knots.
witness description: Capt. Gallager, Capt. Thompson, and Capt. Sparks of the 67th Fi Bomb Sq at Carroll AFB.
